X-ray 1

I'm X-ray-one your personal assistant. I am programmed to minor tasks like' 'opening youtube,your browser,gmail and stackoverflow ,predict time,search wikipedia,predict weather' 'in different cities , get top headline news and you can ask me computational or geographical questions too!

Get Started

Built to learn you!

Learning you to give you the support you need in every situation. With X-ray 2 it will learn you by watching you through your cameras and support you! The AI can check up on you . The program will be able to understand people as it learns and the system only runs for you, personal or commercial.
